Orientado(a)(s): George David Birkhoff , Leonard Eugene Dickson , Theophil Henry Hildebrandt , Derrick Norman Lehmer , Robert Lee Moore , Oswald Veblen , Anna Johnson Pell Wheeler
Instituições: Universidade Northwestern 1886–87, 1889–92, Universidade Yale 1887–89 , Universidade de Chicago 1892–1931
Tese: 1885: Extensions of Certain Theorems of Clifford and Cayley in the Geometry of n Dimensions
